# allTagNames

**Instance Property**

An array of tag names for the audio unit component.

## Declaration

```swift
var allTagNames: [String] { get }
```

## Getting audio unit component tags

- **iconURL**: The URL of an icon that represents the audio unit component.
- **icon**: An icon that represents the component.
- **localizedTypeName**: The localized type name of the component.
- **userTagNames**: An array of tags the user creates.
